title.en: Merched y Wawr Maenclochog Branch - Celebrating the branch's 40th anniversary
title.cy: Merched y Wawr Cangen Maenclochog - Dathlu 40 y Gangen

description.en:
Merched y Wawr Cangen Maenclochog yn Dathlu Deugain y gangen yn 2011.
Rhes gefn – Gretta Gibby, Ogwen Phillips, Gina Lewis, Vi Edwards, Eiry Phillips, Tryphena Williams, Eirwen Gibby, Ann Morris, Peggy Phillips, Sheila Vaughan, Aerona Edwards, Mona Lewis a Llinos Edwards.
Rhes flaen – Eirianwen Thomas, Gill Phillips, Mary Llewellyn, Beryl John, Maureen George, Rhiannon Edwards, Mattie Lewis
